name: Magic Screen (Etch-A-Sketch) (SGB)
description:
Magic Screen (Etch-A-Sketch) (GB) is a homebrew software for the Nintendo Game Boy developed in C by Ryoga using the GBDK (GameBoy Development Kit).

The controls are the following:

  • A. Enable Cursor / Disable Cursor.
  • B. Enable Cursor / Disable Cursor.
  • SELECT. Erase the screen.
  • START. HOW TO… use this software.
  • UP, LEFT, RIGHT, DOWN. Move the cursor.

This ROM can be run on both Game Boy and Game Boy Color compatible emulators and flashcarts. The compressed file includes the two versions of the ROM (v1.0 and v1.1). The new version of the ROM (v1.1) is compatible with the Super Game Boy and includes its own custom border.

In order to run this rom you need to use a Game Boy / Game Boy Color emulator.
